cards.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/static.flickr.com/47/139644210_2680574f9b.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/139644210/ "photo sharing") [Political Balloon](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/139644210/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
One of the local [independent candidates for the Lewisham mayor](http://www.johnhamilton.co.uk/) took the cheap and cheerful approach to advertising his candidacy. Spotted this morning, on my way to Lewisham Station.
